passives.name: Fill the Soul
passives.effects: Gain a charge each time you or champions within 800 units cast an [[champion ability|ability]], up to 30. At maximum charges, gain {{as|{{pp|100 to 250}} ability power}} and {{as|{{pp|15 to 25|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for the rest of the round, as well as a {{pp|400 to 750}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until destroyed. Charges are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

effects_structured.raw: Gain a charge each time you or champions within 800 units cast an [[champion ability|ability]], up to 30. At maximum charges, gain {{as|{{pp|100 to 250}} ability power}} and {{as|{{pp|15 to 25|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for the rest of the round, as well as a {{pp|400 to 750}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until destroyed. Charges are reset every round and between each phase in a round.
